numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that legacy applicants have a higher acceptance rate.
2. I noticed that a person who has more money has a bigger advantage.
3. The graph is heavily skewed toward rich people.
4. I wonder why the graph is heavily skewed toward rich people.
5. I wonder if systems could be put in place to remedy this imbalance.
6. This situation has a great impact on me.
7. This situation has a great impact on my community.
8. The people in my community are currently applying to college.
9. The graph shows that rich people have an unfair advantage in accessing education.
10. The headline is: The rich get richer: how the wealthy monopolize elite education.
